items.title: Hindustan Unilever shares decline 1.08% in today's session; over 5.29 lakh shares traded
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 2,641, Hindustan Unilever experienced a dip of 1.08% from its previous close in today's session.

items.description: Solar Industries India shares gained 2.07% to trade at Rs 14,763.00 in Thursday's session, driven by positive investor activity.

items.title: Jupiter Wagons shares surge up to 13% on receiving LoI for Vande Bharat Wheelsets
items.description: Jupiter Wagons shaers touched an intraday high of Rs 371.80 per share on the NSE, rising 12.72 percent. The stock had opened with a gain of 6.11 percent.

items.title: Newly-listed Shanti Gold shares rally 11% after Q1 net profit surges 174% to Rs 25 crore
items.description: Shanti Gold share price: The shares of the company have so far jumped more than 20% since their debut on stock markets on August 1.

items.title: Global Health: In the pink of health, but growth will come at a price
items.description: Demand for high-end healthcare facilities remains strong; however, the company’s valuation appears demanding

items.title: Hexaware Technologies shares rally 4% as Nuvama initiates with buy; 23% upside seen
items.description: Hexaware Technologies share price: The recent decline in Hexaware’s stock after soft Q2CY25 earnings has created a favourable entry point, Nuvama said.

items.title: Interglobe Aviation shares slip 2% as Kotak downgrades stock to "add" amid capacity cuts
items.description: InterGlobe Aviation share price: Kotak Institutional Equities downgraded the stock to ‘add’, citing faster-than-peer capacity cuts. However, the brokerage maintained a bullish target of Rs 6,850, expecting yield growth during the festive season

items.title: Godrej Properties rises 2% as it secures Hyderabad land parcel with Rs 3,800 crore revenue potential

items.description: UltraTech Cement shares were trading in the red with marginal losses.

items.title: EIH: Why this hotel stock is a good bet on luxury stays
items.description: A strong balance sheet and cash flow generation over the next two years would enable EIHL to undertake planned expansion.

items.title: RailTel Corp shares jump 4% as it secures multiple orders worth over Rs 50 crore
items.description: RailTel share price: The company has secured projects worth over Rs 50 crore, including data centre services in Kerala and bilingual website development for Odisha colleges

items.title: Tech Mahindra shares in focus as it incorporates Saudi arm to expand footprint
items.description: Tech Mahindra has incorporated a new wholly-owned subsidiary in Saudi Arabia to manage its operations in Bahrain and Egypt. This move comes shortly after its Italian design subsidiary Pininfarina boosted its stake in Signature S.r.l. from 24 percent to 84 percent.

items.title: Can Sensex, Nifty carry their rally into a sixth day? Key levels to monitor on August 21
items.description: Dalal Street rallied for a fifth consecutive session on Wednesday as investors continued to remain optimistic around the Centre's plan to rationalise Goods and Services Tax.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: Oil prices gained slightly on Thursday as larger-than-expected declines crude oil and fuel inventories in the U.S., the world's biggest oil user, supported expectations for steady demand.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex, Nifty at day's high; Clean Science, Ola Electric, Swiggy, Jupiter Wagons most active
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Bajaj Finserv, SBI Life Insurance, Reliance Industries, Tata Motors, Kotak Mahindra Bank are among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers are Tata Consumer, Bajaj Finance, Maruti Suzuki, Hero MotoCorp, Cipla. BSE Midcap and smallcap indices are trading flat. Except IT, media, pharma, all other sectoral indices are trading in the green.

items.description: The market may retain its gradual upward trajectory, given healthy technical indicators. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.

items.title: Sebi close to finalising block deal norms, with higer price range and deal size
items.description: Block deal regulations are being reviewed as markets have grown and the size of block deals has gone up. The framework was first introduced in 2005 and has been reviewed periodically.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Clean Science, Shanti Gold, India Cements, RailTel, Jupiter Wagons, V-Guard, Fortis, Innova Captab, Poly Medicure in focus on 21 August
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 21 August: Stocks like Clean Science and Technology, Shanti Gold International, India Cements, RailTel Corporation of India, Jupiter Wagons, V-Guard Industries, Fortis Healthcare, Innova Captab, Poly Medicure, Enviro Infra Engineers, and Prostarm info Systems will be in focus on August 21.
